colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,('DI YANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN BSRUNG CHEN PO RNAMS LA DUS GTOR DANG RGYUN GYI MCHOD GTOR SOGS KYI SKABS LA NYE BAR MKHO BA'I BKA' BABS ^DPAL LDAN DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RNAL 'BYOR PA RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS, CHOS SKYONG BSRUNG MA SPYI LA LAS BZHI'I 'PHRIN BCOL CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG 'BUL TSIG 'DOD GSOL BCAS PA ^NIRMA nA K'A YA WAG'INDRA SAm GHAS SGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: NIRMA nA K'A YA WAG'INDRA SAm GHA,
